snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the full extended reveal here: https://youtu.be/HwhvfH-Ij8Q  
Join us in Seattle for the long-awaited Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 in this gameplay trailer!
